name: FastAPI-Python
description: Python microservice for OSINT analysis using custom Python scripts. Integrates multiple OSINT tools and APIs.

options.name: fast_api_url
options.label: FastAPI Service URL
options.description: URL of the Python FastAPI microservice

options.name: virustotal_api_key
options.label: VirusTotal API Key
options.description: VirusTotal API key for the Python scripts

options.name: abuseipdb_api_key
options.label: AbuseIPDB API Key
options.description: AbuseIPDB API key for IP reputation checks

options.name: urlvoid_api_key
options.label: URLVoid API Key
options.description: URLVoid API key for URL/domain analysis

options.name: shodan_api_key
options.label: Shodan API Key
options.description: Shodan API key for advanced network analysis

options.name: timeout
options.label: Analysis Timeout (seconds)
options.description: Maximum time to wait for analysis completion

features: Custom Python scripts for each target type
